thread.title: Japanese Studies Program Coordinator awarded Japanese Foreign Minister's Commendation (York University)
thread.title_full: Japanese Studies Program Coordinator awarded Japanese Foreign Minister's Commendation (York University) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Japanese Studies Program Coordinator awarded Japanese Foreign Minister's Commendation (York University)
text: ( Source : York University ) Professor Norio Ota Professor Norio Ota, coordinator of the Japanese Studies Program , Department of Languages, Literatures and Linguistics, has been awarded a commendation from Japan 's Minister for Foreign Affairs .
